column5: Yep, it's ground hog day again....but this time I got up nice and early and took out my trusty .22-250 Ruger named "Chuckmate" and I shot that rodent before he had a chance to see his shadow....and I just checked the long range forecast and I think it worked....
So early that it started last fall. Brutal excuse for a winter this year. Them pine beetles are gonna have a great year.
OH NO....I think I shot the wrong rodent.....  http://www.buffalonews.com/topics/winter_2011-12/article720005.ece
Hm, you're right. You did shoot the wrong rodent. That one looks a little suspicious, should be assassinated...
I got a feeling the ticks are gonna have a great year too..
Not to mention black flies and the Canadian Air Force (mosquitoes)
The local groundhog is never wrong---an early spring and six more weeks of winter are the same thing!!
You are NEVER suppose to mention that....It's like telling kids there is no Santa Claus....
